title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Oct 19 WE [sebaygo1]

Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site ::

reporter and co-host of Infowars Nightly News, Aaron Dykes, is joined by Alex as he continues his assignment on the road. 

Prison Planet.com journalist and editor Paul Joseph Watson reports on Ahmed Maher -- who helped lead EgyptÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s \"Arab Spring\" that resulted in military dictatorship -- and his role as OWS advisor. 

Journalist and author Webster Tarpley talks about the growing momentum for a disastrous war against Iran under false pretense and he also talks about the End the Fed protests around the country. 

Alan Watt makes an appearance to talk about the New World Order and its agenda for world enslavement.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the \"big 
 picture.\" A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you\'ve researched it yourself.
